SEARCH
Package com.illiasalohub.movieapp.services

Class MoviesService

java.lang.Object
com.illiasalohub.movieapp.services.MoviesService
public class MoviesService extends Object
Service class for managing movies. This class provides functionality to add, delete, retrieve, and filter movies, as well as persist changes to storage.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MoviesService(DataProcessor dataManager)
    Constructs a MoviesService with a data processor for handling movie data.

      public MoviesService(DataProcessor dataManager)
      Constructs a MoviesService with a data processor for handling movie data.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • saveMovies

      public void saveMovies()
      Saves the movies to the data storage.

    • addMovie

      public void addMovie(Movie movie)
      Adds a movie to the collection and saves the updated collection to storage.
      Parameters:
      movie - the movie to add.

    • getMovies

      public List<Movie> getMovies()
      Retrieves all movies from the collection.
      Returns:
      a list of all movies.

    • getMovieById

      public Movie getMovieById(int id)
      Retrieves a movie by its id.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the movie to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the movie if found, otherwise null.

    • deleteMovie

      public boolean deleteMovie(int movieId)
      Deletes a movie from the collection by its ID and saves the updated collection if the deletion was successful.
      Parameters:
      movieId - the ID of the movie to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the movie was successfully deleted, false otherwise.

    • filterByTitle

      public List<Movie> filterByTitle(String title)
      Filters movies by title.
      Parameters:
      title - the title to filter by.
      Returns:
      a list of movies that contain the specified title in their titles.

    • filterByDirector

      public List<Movie> filterByDirector(String director)
      Filters movies by director.
      Parameters:
      director - the director to filter by.
      Returns:
      a list of movies that have the specified director.

    • filterByGenre

      public List<Movie> filterByGenre(String genre)
      Filters movies by genre.
      Parameters:
      genre - the genre to filter by.
      Returns:
      a list of movies that belong to the specified genre.

    • filterByYearRange

      public List<Movie> filterByYearRange(int startYear, int endYear)
      Filters movies within a specified range of years.
      Parameters:
      startYear - the starting year of the range.
      endYear - the ending year of the range.
      Returns:
      a list of movies that were released within the specified year range.

    • filterByStatus

      public List<Movie> filterByStatus(Statuses status)
      Filters movies by their status.
      Parameters:
      status - the status to filter by.
      Returns:
      a list of movies that have the specified status.

    • filterByRatingRange

      public List<Movie> filterByRatingRange(double minRating, double maxRating)
      Filters movies by a range of ratings.
      Parameters:
      minRating - the minimum rating of the range.
      maxRating - the maximum rating of the range.
      Returns:
      a list of movies that have ratings within the specified range.
